abstract: Carl C. Icahn called on Motorola Mobility last month to explore ways to get more value from its patent portfolio. It appears his request has been granted.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn called on Motorola Mobility last month to explore ways to get more value from its patent portfolio. It appears his request has been granted.
lead_paragraph: Motorola Mobility shareholders are undoubtedly exuberant about Google‘s $12.5 billion deal for the cellphone maker.

headline.main: In Google’s Motorola Deal, Icahn Gets His Wish (Again)

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
